Name: LU 879 - Zoning, Broadway and 11th Street Rezoning, Queens (C 210025 ZMQ)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 210025 ZMQ, a Zoning Map amendment (Preconsidered L.U. No. 879).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - October 21, 2021

RTF:
{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fmodern\fprq1\fcharset0 Courier;}}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca, Jr. and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, 11 St & Broadway LLC,\expndtw-6  filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 9a, changing from an R5 District to an M1-4/R7A District and establishing a Special Mixed Use District (MX-23), which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of a seven-story mixed use building at 11-01 33rd Avenue (Block 316, Lots 1 and 13), in the Ravenswood neighborhood of Queens, Community District 1 (ULURP No. C210025 ZMQ) (the "Application");\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
WHEREAS the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on September 27, 2021 its decision dated September 22, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 210026\expndtw-4  ZRQ\expndtw0  (Pre. L.U. No. 880), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area and establish a Special Mixed Use District (MX 23);\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tx2880\tx3600\tx4320\tx5040\tx5760\tx6480\tx7200\tx7560\tx7920\tx8640\tx8933\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on October 5, 2021;\par
\par
WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the Negative Declaration issued April 19, 2021 (CEQR No. 21DCP022Q), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to hazardous materials, air quality, and noise (the \ldblquote E\rdblquote  Designation (E-613));\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj  \par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx864\tx2016\tx3168\tx4320\tx5472\tx6624\tx7776\tx8928 RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 210025 ZMQ, incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 9a:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720 1.\tab changing from an R5 District to an M1-4/R7A District property bounded by Broadway, 12\fs16 th \fs24 Street, 33\fs16 rd \fs24 Avenue, and 11th Street; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-360\li720 2.\tab establishing a Special Mixed Use District (MX-23) bounded by Broadway, 12\fs16 th \fs24 Street, 33\fs16 rd \fs24 Avenue, and 11th Street;\f1  \f0\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated April 19, 2021, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-613, Community District 1, Borough of Queens.\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi-720\li720\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\f0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk, \}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,  \} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on October 21, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
